column1: We cannot afford to let our guard down when it comes to stopping the spread of #COVID19 in Southern Arizona.  Practice social distancing wash your hands and #MaskUpAZ. https://t.co/zJTONp1hp1

It shouldn't take pleas on social media for us to finally take this pandemic seriously.   We can all play a part in keeping our communities loved ones and frontline healthcare workers safe.   Stay home if you're sick social distance and wear a mask. https://t.co/FgqAOpu0D2

With #COVID19 cases rises please make sure to get a test if you have any symptoms.   Pima County is expanding testing and including both drive-thru and walk-up locations.  Stay safe practice social distancing and #MaskUpAZ. https://t.co/yzqrdgBo3T

With flu season and the holidays coming up now is not the time to let your guard down. #COVID19 remains a serious threat.  Please continue following CDC guidelines practice social distancing and wear a mask when you're out in public. https://t.co/tB8km5YSVC

Stay safe and #MaskUpArizona.   The #COVID19 pandemic isn't over and cases are steadily rising in Arizona.   Continue following CDC guidelines and playing your part to keep our communities safe. https://t.co/BLUhLL2JTL

As #COVID19 cases are starting to rise again in Arizona please continue to follow CDC guidelines practice social distancing and #MaskUp to stop the spread of the virus.   We can all play a role in keeping our friends family and neighbors safe. https://t.co/zYdlv7ZVSN
220000 have died millions sickened and our economy is in shambles. due to #COVID19.  The White House doesn't have a plan. They never did.  https://t.co/CYSs2HjKjX

It’s time to #MaskUp Arizona! Put on a mask and play your part in stopping the spread of #COVID19 in our communities.   I challenge @TucsonRomero @thesuperteacher and @ElRioHealth to show us a picture of their #Maskie and help us keep our communities safe. https://t.co/vDzXRAGqV2

#COVID19 has not 'gone away.' It's still wreaking havoc on our communities straining our hospitals and endangering the lives of our heroic first responders.   Wear a mask avoid large gatherings practice social distancing and keep your community safe. https://t.co/2DpFPCAOcN

People are dead workers are unemployed businesses are shuttered and Trump reverts to his longstanding view of #COVID19: 'It is what it is.'   The House has already passed the #HeroesAct. It's time for the Senate to do the same. https://t.co/qqJZYQeHKI

I know from experience that COVID-19 is a serious issue and I wish the President & First Lady a full recovery.   They now join over 7 million Americans & their families who know all too well the severity of this virus.   Wear a mask and continue to practice social distancing.

Trump's public heath communications concerning #COVID19 have been an unmitigated disaster and contributed to the spread of misinformation across the country.   We should be listening to scientists not the ramblings of an unstable president. https://t.co/CAvT3D8reO

#COVID19 has exacerbated food insecurity in families across the country and will only worsen if Congress fails to act to address it.   This includes strengthening food assistance programs to help our families not just survive but thrive. https://t.co/Iafn5kHtSr

If Republicans and President Trump would have taken #COVID19 seriously from the beginning we could have saved countless lives.   The President's negligence and willingness to put politics over public health #FailThePeople.   It's a disgrace. https://t.co/3UFAPgaUIC

We've reached the grim milestone of 200000 dead from #COVID19 and Trump continues to put politics over science.   From the very beginning this administration's response to this public health and economic emergency has been an utter failure. https://t.co/4S9x6q1Dvb

This #SmallBusinessWeek I want to recognize the small businesses in #AZ03 that have supported our community throughout the #COVID19 pandemic.   You are vital to our communities and economies and I will keep fighting in Congress to get the resources you need to recover. https://t.co/MRZNoo0wJL

Latino Native American and Black communities have been disproportionately impacted by #COVID19 as the virus exacerbated numerous issues that already existed.   Our response to the virus & economic recovery must address these longstanding disparities.  https://t.co/nVtnQoOobr

I spoke with @NCAI1944 at #TUID2020 on the work @NRDems have been doing for Indian country on wildfires Bureau of Indian Education schools reopening the #2020Census and #COVID19.   The status quo does not fit the long term solutions for Indian Country. https://t.co/DNFn1bidfG

#COVID19 has raged across Indian Country yet BIE has not adequately consulted with tribes on the safest education options for the school year.   @NRDems held a hearing last week and BIE didn't even send a representative.   Their absence speaks volumes. https://t.co/obkioBlyUX

#COVID19 reports and information to the public should be governed by science--not the President's political considerations.   It's a disgrace that the Trump cares more about his political future than the deaths of almost 200000 Americans. https://t.co/7OtZEWedT0

March 19: 12600+ confirmed COVID cases in U.S. 265 confirmed COVID deaths in U.S. Today: 6334150+ confirmed COVID cases in U.S. 189970+ confirmed COVID deaths in U.S.  #TrumpKnew said nothing and still refuses to take responsibility for his incompetence. https://t.co/UklbzAFWrm

Almost 200000 Americans have died from #COVID19 with the disproportionate impacts felt in communities of color.    The lack of urgency to pass the #HeroesAct while our brothers and sisters die is a national disgrace.   It's time for the Senate to act. https://t.co/vJP63Pg5qr

The Trump Administration’s disastrous response to #COVID19 is making it impossible for schools to reopen safely.   Without relief state and local governments will have to make significant cuts to public education.   This is why the Senate must pass the #HeroesAct. #SaveOurStates https://t.co/hvRxlsXN8p

In June I sent a letter to Sec. of State Pompeo urging him to consider working with the Guatemalan government to help extend COVID-19 aid in rural and indigenous communities in Guatemala. COVID-19 has decimated jobs incomes and fundamental access to food security in the region. https://t.co/3LUXU2FABY

Trump's disastrous coronavirus response has made it impossible for many schools to reopen safely. Now Senate Republicans are refusing to provide schools the funding they need to make classrooms safe. #HeroesAct  It’s time for Republicans in Washington to put #FamiliesFirst. https://t.co/HfANsvZ1z3

#SocialSecurity has meant economic security for millions of Americans. Now Trump is trying to defund it after his administration failed to contain COVID19.   Congress must take action to stop this assault on Social Security. https://t.co/Z81YhKVfEP

Farmworkers are showing up each day to pick the food that keeps our food supply stable during the #COVID19 pandemic.   Proud to join my @HispanicCaucus colleagues in urging growers to implement the workplace protections that farmworkers deserve. https://t.co/KqiGA3Qh1h

Let me say is louder for the people in the back: You are not immune to #COVID19 is you are young.   We should all be following CDC guidelines practicing social distancing and wearing a mask to stop the spread of the virus in our communities. https://t.co/EgPew5bl7N

#IRS is reopening registration period for federal benefits recipients to enter info about qualifying children and receive their supplemental $500 Economic Impact Payments. You can use the tool from Aug. 15 through Sept. 30. #COVIDreliefIRS https://t.co/uv93CN6ID0 https://t.co/1uI5eP5Fr4

Social Security was created during another economic crisis the Great Depression.   As our nation’s older Americans face the uncertainty of both a public health and economic #COVID19 crisis we must protect and expand this critical lifeline #ForThePeople. #SocSec85 https://t.co/UGLFhnMxDe

Latinas are disproportionately represented among the essential workers of the #COVID19 crisis - putting Latinas at higher risk of contracting the coronavirus.  Latina workers need hazard pay ASAP - and the #HEROESAct provides it. It’s past time for the Senate to pass the bill. https://t.co/xVZsghctwb

I have tested positive for COVID-19.   As a result I will be self-isolating in quarantine. I currently have no symptoms feel fine and hope to make a quick & speedy recovery.  COVID-19 is not a joke & we should all take this seriously.   My full statement: https://t.co/nnBskdSyTF

As #COVID19 continues to impact our communities Congress & the American people must  hear directly from the government’s health experts about how the Administration intends to address this situation.   Join @COVIDOversight now to hear from Dr. Fauci: https://t.co/jQVlBTQ4EU

The #COVID19 pandemic has devastated communities of color disproportionately impacted by long-standing health disparities. We must continue to push for solutions that eliminate health inequities and improve the health and well-being of Latino communities. #HealthEquity https://t.co/dpFCkt3N5z

These vaccine trials are an important step toward ensuring that we can quickly develop a safe vaccine to stop the spread of #COVID19 in our communities & get back to some normalcy. I'm pleased a diverse place like Pima County has been selected. https://t.co/gZd9JZ2jDH

Testing is expanding on the South side of Phoenix. Anyone who needs a #COVID19 test--regardless of your location--should pre-register to receive your tests and face masks.   Help us all stop the spread of COVID-19 in Arizona. https://t.co/FcGKLEJrfB

Border wall construction is still ongoing during the #COVID19 crisis and is destroying the environmental treasures of Southern Arizona.   The waiving of laws that allows construction to continue without any concern for the environment must end. https://t.co/hgwgsHGkRp

Robust testing is the only way that we are going to be able to mitigate the spread of #COVID19.   Trump is putting his political interests over the health and well-being of people in Arizona and other virus hotspots. https://t.co/MJ5XVMOYbO

Evicting families in the middle of a pandemic is immoral cruel and in humane.  Any future #COVID19 stimulus package must include #RentReliefNow for the millions of Americans out of work and unable to pay.  https://t.co/ukvxHPfP38

The less time we spend addressing this crisis now the longer it will last.  We can't normalize the preventable deaths of our neighbors loved ones and friends at the hands of #COVID19.   Stay home practice social distancing and wear a mask in public. https://t.co/VPYO9P52eL

The #COVID19 outbreak in Arizona is serious.   Please follow CDC guidelines continue practicing social distancing wear a mask and listen to healthcare officials telling all of us to stay home. https://t.co/07JAjlZk6j

Arizona's #COVID19 response has been a failure on the part of the State and the White House and nowhere is that more evident than in testing capacity.  We need FEMA to coordinate with the state on a testing blitz to keep our communities safe. https://t.co/eHKmDgeWXE

If you haven't been taking #COVID19 seriously it's time to get it together and do so.  Arizona's cases are surging and hospitalizations are rising.  STAY HOME practice social distancing and WEAR A MASK in public. https://t.co/0mmB0Swkbc

This is a national disgrace.  Testing is how we identify treat and trace #COVID19; and the massive failure of the Trump Administration to ensure adequate testing for new hot spots has put our communities at risk. https://t.co/mpoTBVvelK

Just because you're young doesn't mean you're immune to #COVID19.   Please stay home practice social distancing and wear a mask when you're in public.   You can help stop the spread of the virus and keep our communities safe. https://t.co/t0ZMJxCL4m

Testing is one of the only tools we have to prevent more Americans from dying from #COVID19.   It’s time for Trump to help our communities invoke the DPA and ensure that labs have the reagents they need to adequately conduct tests. https://t.co/WxmEOCNnLs

Arizonans don't need a useless photo op.   We need funding for hospitals robust testing and contact tracing and real leadership to stop the spread of #COVID19.  The Trump Administration has recklessly endangered the lives of all Arizonans. https://t.co/NNxWXmGgQx
#COVID19 still threatens the health of all Arizonans.   Follow the latest recommendation practice social distancing and wear a mask.   https://t.co/8eR4rMkCr9
